attributes.action: Increase the range of diet drinks for diabetics in food outlets
attributes.additional_details:
There is an increasing amount of diet drinks on the market e.g diet coke, sprite zero, fanta zero, 7up free etc.  There are currently thought to be 2.8 million diabetes (type 1 and type 2) in the UK diabetes
However go to your local mc donalds, subway etc and you will see that there is only one diet sugar free drink - usually diet coke!
